text:
KiSSFLOW | Chennai, India | ONSITE KiSSFLOW, the #1 workflow product in Google Apps Marketplace is hiring Python, Android and iOS developers.We are rapidly growing and have customers in more than 100 countries.

Stack: Python, Google App Engine, AWS, AngularJS, Android and iOS.

Should be able to relocate to chennai. You can mail us at joinus@orangescape.com
